supporting_spans: The spectacles and telescope gave him a high opinion of Paganel, whom he attached carefully to his person, not only by his benefits, but by strong flaxen ropes, especially at night.
reasoning: Evidence supports: These excerpts show that Paganel was able to win the trust of the native tribe by sketching star-maps and in return learned tracking techniques and herbal lore.

analysis.claim_text: While being helped by a native tribe he won their trust by sketching star-maps and in return learned tracking techniques and herbal lore.

sub_claims.text: Jacques Paganel was helped by a native tribe.
Jacques Paganel won the trust of the native tribe by sketching star-maps.
In return for his help, Jacques Paganel learned tracking techniques from the native tribe.
Jacques Paganel also learned herbal lore from the native tribe.

analysis.reasoning: Evidence supports: These excerpts show that Paganel was able to win the trust of the native tribe by sketching star-maps and in return learned tracking techniques and herbal lore.
